sn48.54:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yani kanici jangalanam pananam padajatani sabbani tani hatthipade samodhanam gacchanti, hatthipadam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—mahantattena;
sn48.54:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici padani bodhaya samvattanti, pannindriyam padam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya.
sn48.54:1.3: Katamani ca, bhikkhave, padani bodhaya samvattanti?
sn48.54:1.4: Saddhindriyam, bhikkhave, padam, tam bodhaya samvattati;
sn48.54:1.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yani kanici jangalanam pananam padajatani sabbani tani hatthipade samodhanam gacchanti, hatthipadam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—mahantattena;
sn48.54:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici padani bodhaya samvattanti, pannindriyam padam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya”ti.
